title: Balaji, Nikshep emerge champs
text:
Balaji, Nikshep emerge champs Balaji, Nikshep emerge champs October 11, 2015, New Delhi, DHNS 
Sriram Balaji and Prerna Bhambri won the men’s and women’s singles titles at the Fenesta National Tennis Championships at the Delhi Lawn Tennis Association (DLTA) complex on Saturday. Balaji, a last-minute entrant, had to come through three rounds of qualifying matches to make it to the main draw. He weathered a stiff challenge from Vishnu for a 7-5, 6-3 victory and capped a memorable week, where he also won the doubles title with VM Ranjeeth on Friday. The win fetched Sriram a wild card for the Delhi Open in 2016.In the women’s final, Prerna dispatched unseeded Sai Samhitha Chamarthi 6-0, 6-1 in a lopsided contest for her fourth title. In the boys under-18 events B Nikshep of Karnataka defeated top seed Aryan Goveas of Maharashtra 3-6, 6-2, 5-7 to emerge champion. The girls’ under-18 title was clinched by Zeel Desai as she beat Sathwika Sama 3-6, 6-3, 7-5.Results (all finals): Men's singles: Sriram Balaji bt Vishnu Vardhan 7-5, 6-3.Women’s singles: Prerna Bhambri bt Samitha Sai Chamarthi 6-0, 6-1.Boys under- 18 singles: BR Nikshep bt Aryan Goveas 6-3, 2-6, 7-5.Girls under-18 singles: Zeel Desai bt Sathwika Sama 3-6, 6-3, 7-5.
